briefdescription.para: Cyclic time of the component InteriorLight2.

detaileddescription.para:
Used in defines: IL2_RESET_COUNTER_STOP IL2_WAIT_FOR_BAP_STOP IL2_ADAPT_AND_CODING_STOP
values 20u

briefdescription.para: Minimum time that BAPHandler_IL2 has to wait before providing Status message after FSG_Control reset.

detaileddescription.para:
Used in define: IL2_RESET_COUNTER_STOP
values 200u

briefdescription.para: Start point of reset counter.

detaileddescription.para:
Used in functions: IL2_Start InteriorLight2_BapIndication_FSG_Control
values 0u

briefdescription.para: Stop point of reset counter.

detaileddescription.para:
Calculated from minimum time and cycle time. Used in function: IL2_resetToDefaults
values IL2_RESET_COUNTER_MIN_TIME/IL2_CYCLE_TIME

briefdescription.para: Number of ms that BAPHandler_IL2 needs to wait before sending any requests to BAP.

detaileddescription.para:
At least 50ms. Used in define: IL2_WAIT_FOR_BAP_STOP
values 60u

briefdescription.para: Start point of waiting for BAP counter.

detaileddescription.para:
Used in function: IL2_Start
values 0u

briefdescription.para: Stop point of waiting for BAP counter.

detaileddescription.para:
Calculated from defined time to wait and cycle time. Used in functions: IL2_initialize IL2_waitForBAP
values IL2_WAIT_FOR_BAP_TIME/IL2_CYCLE_TIME

briefdescription.para: Number of ms that BAPHandler_IL2 waits before will perform next check of the adaptations/codings.

detaileddescription.para:
Used in define: IL2_ADAPT_AND_CODING_STOP
values 3000u

briefdescription.para: Start point of adaptation/coding checking counter.

detaileddescription.para:
Used in functions: IL2_Start IL2_run
values 0u

briefdescription.para: Stop point of adaptation/coding checking counter.

detaileddescription.para:
Calculated from defined time to wait and cycle time. Used in define: IL2_ADAPT_AND_CODING_STOP
values IL2_ADAPT_AND_CODING_TIME/IL2_CYCLE_TIME

briefdescription.para: Value of Perso Status for activated Personalisation 2.0.

detaileddescription.para:
Used in functions: IL2_run
values 2u

briefdescription.para: Value of Perso Status for not activated Personalisation 2.0.

detaileddescription.para:
Used in define: IL2_ADAPT_AND_CODING_STOP
values 0u

Used in structure: di58_PSO_ImExport_ParameterMap Used in function: InteriorLight2_BapIndication_Brightness

Used in function: IL2_isAvailable_Brightness
values 3u

reset of properties has been performed.

Number of handled PSO parameters.

detaileddescription.para: T_E_PSO_Parameters_e
The enum to define the list of all personalized parameters handled by InteriorLights2.
The structure to store the elements of PSO_Data parameter used by PSO_ImExport function.
Data buffer to use by ImExport functionality of BAPHandler_IL2.
PSO ImExport Parameter Map of all personalised parameters handled by InteriorLight2.
PSO user profile structure stores the information about active user and control commands.
The structure to store the pointers to functions required by PSO_ImExport functionality.
The structure to store the informations required by PSO_ImExport functionality.
Default values for BAPHandler PSO properties stored in NvM
Starts-up/initializes the BAPHandler_IL2 (Interior Light) module.

Called by function BAPHandler_IL2_Start in order to prepare the real start-up/init of the BAPHandler_IL2 module. Shall be called only once during Start-up.
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must ensure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module. multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous.
N/A
N/A
void
void
Globals
[in] di58_PSO_ImExport_User [in] di58_PSO_ImExport_ParameterMap [in] Pim_BAPHandler_IL2_BAPHandler_IL2_PSOParameters [in] Pim_BAPHandler_IL2_BAPHandler_IL2_PSOParameters_defaults [in] di58_PSO_ImExport_PSO_Data [in] di58_ImExport_DataBuffer_pa [in] di58_PSO_Functions_s [in, out] IL2_AdaptCodings [in, out] di58_PSO_ImExport [out] initialization_setup_state [out] IL2_state [out] IL2_ResetState [out] persoStatus [out] di58_IL2_BAPTaskCounter [out] di58_IL2_AdaptAndCodingCounter [out] di58_IL2_ResetCounter [out] IL2_Functions_S [out] IL2_PIM_PSO_Parameters [out] IL2_PIM_PSO_Parameters_Old [out] IL2_AdaptCodings_Old
Input->Output-Correlation
The BapHandler for InteriorLight is initialized. Adaptations and codings are read, PSO_ImExport library is initialized, a copy of NvM data is prepared.
Call Sequence
Test Method
SWATT unit tests. The testing method is described in: TEST_IL2_Start
Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. This is a function needed for the initialization of the BAPHandler_IL2 module.
Cyclic function of the InteriorlLight2 module. Called every 20ms. It hosts InteriorlLight2 State Machine and calls specific functions dependingly on what state currently InteriorlLight2 is running.

The modules of functions are called cyclicly by BAPHandler_IL2_TaskCyclicEvent, depending on the IL2_state state.
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must ensure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module. multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous.
N/A
N/A
void
void
Globals
[in] IL2_state
Input->Output-Correlation
This function doesn't have impact on global variables.
Call Sequence
Test Method
SWATT unit tests. The testing method is described in: TEST_IL2_Cycle
Traceability
This function satisfies partially following DOORS Requirement:
Satisfies requirement
SWR_L3_CRoute_PSO_AP_590
Stops the BAPHandler_IL2 (Interior Light) module.

Called by function BAPHandler_IL2_Stop. It is empty function.

briefdescription.para: This file provides handling of BAP communication between actual Dimming Master module and BAP protocol.

detaileddescription.para:
Source
IL2_Main.h Revision
2.1 Author
Wojciech Sowinski (uib18192), Artur Redosz (uidp7980) Date
2022-11-28 It hosts BAP InteriorLight2 (IL2) LSG. It main purpose is to provide brightness value from user (via HMI) to Dimming Master and store its personalised values accordingly to user slots.
This file can be included by other modules
